snippet: The National Transportation Safety Board did not want to ”categorically” rule out the use of lithium-ion batteries to power aircraft systems.
lead_paragraph: The National Transportation Safety Board did not want to ”categorically” rule out the use of lithium-ion batteries to power aircraft systems.

headline.seo: Lithium Batteries Are Not Necessarily Unsafe, Safety Board Says
headline.main: Safety Board Says Lithium Batteries Are Not Necessarily Unsafe
headline.print_headline: Safety Board Says Lithium Batteries Are Not Necessarily Unsafe
